data.title: MAD Tank, my opinion
data.body: Bring that awesome technician back! Or at the very least make the e1 run around a like the technician did. Looks so stupid with an e1 just shilling when the tank goes off.

data.title: Commando fixes for walls
data.body:
as the title states fixes commando units being able to c4 walls.

Fixes #4648

data.title: Move order lag change announcements to server.log
Reduced range and increased build time of static defense
data.body:
As described in #4723 - this is my first attempt at a Pull Request for those changes.

Guard Tower
- Reduced range from 6 to 5
- Reduced vision from 7 to 6
- Increased buildtime from 12s to 24s

Gun Turret
- Reduced range from 6 to 5
- Reduced vision from 7 to 6
- Increased buildtime from 15s to 30s

SAM Site
- Reduced range from 10 to 7
- Increased buildtime from 18s to 36s

Advanced Guard Tower
- Reduced range from 8 to 6
- Reduced vision from 9 to 7
- Increased buildtime from 24s to 48s

Obelisk of Light
- Reduced range from 8.5 to 6.5
- Reduced vision from 8 to 7
- Increased buildtime from 36s to 52s

data.title: Reduce range and increase build time of static defense
data.body:
Currently static defence in TD is extremely powerful. This leads to more turtling, passive play styles, and overall boring games. The primary reason why static defence is this powerful I believe is because it's easy to get in a pinch and covers a pretty significant amount of space for relatively little cost, in particular compared to units. There's just not much of a drawback in investing in them, nor does it require a lot of thought into where you build them.

I suggest the following changes to remedy this situation.

Guard Tower
- Reduce range from 6 to 5
- Reduce vision from 7 to 6
- Increase buildtime from 12s to 24s

Gun Turret
- Reduce range from 6 to 5
- Reduce vision from 7 to 6
- Increased buildtime from 15s to 30s

SAM Site
- Reduce range from 10 to 7
- Increase buildtime from 18s to 36s

Advanced Guard Tower
- Reduce range from 8 to 6
- Reduce vision from 9 to 7
- Increase buildtime from 24s to 48s

Obelisk of Light
- Reduce range from 8.5 to 6.5
- Reduce vision from 8 to 7
- Increase buildtime from 36s to 52s

I've assembled a mod which includes these changes:
https://mega.co.nz/#!VptRHJ5R!bZKC2PwLIwRZJ8ZojYGo5wrNQ7W_IBLSgW2fc_Bocas

data.title: Chat field does not have focus by default in game lobby
data.body: This is a minor issue. When I join a game lobby and immediately start typing something I realize that the chat typing field does not have focus and what I've typed is lost. It would be better if the chat field had focus by default.

data.title: Changed A10's vision.
data.body:
This is a fix for issue #4696
This copies the camera logic from the spy planes, to the A10s.
Mention has been made that spy planes and A10s should share this logic, instead of copying it. However, spy planes spawn a camera for a certain time, while I decided to make camera visible only while A10s are in range.

data.title: Strange artifacts in SHP(TS) renderer
data.body: see video http://rghost.ru/52620366 for example

data.title: Performance issues with AI building placement
data.body:
One of the biggest AI-related performance issues besides its problems with pathfinding is when it tries to place a building. In particular if it fails to find any room for it within the max base perimeter because the base has become too large or the building type cannot be built on the available ground type (example: ship yard when there is no water nearby).

In my case the AI wanted to build an advanced power plant, then couldn't find space for it, started its production again, failed to find space for it again, and so on, each time resulting in a massive tick_time lag spike.

There's a minimum of aspects to this that need to be fixed before I consider this issue solved:
- [ ] performance of the space check in general needs to be improved significantly, the lag spike when searching for space is simply too large - #8770 + #8759
- [x] if the AI had to abort placement of a building due to lack of space once, it should stop trying to build and place a structure again until it loses a structure (sold, destroyed, captured) - #8759

data.title: Add observer/replay interface features to TD
data.body:
Currently there are none, and much has been said about redesigning the existing window in Red Alert, so simply using that would not suffice.

I've drawn up a few mock ups of how these might look, trying to adhere to the style already present in the TD UI.

![productiontabopenra-3](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/6692167/2240667/41dcd8bc-9ca2-11e3-8248-46cd4d1fefd9.jpg)

![economytabopenra](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/6692167/2240669/636f6d96-9ca2-11e3-861c-d7af2779510a.jpg)

![assetcounttabopenra](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/6692167/2240671/67181042-9ca2-11e3-99f3-cdfc68661ed6.jpg)

data.title: Added the Tiberium Stalk
data.body: from http://kilkakon.com/projects.php?category=0&base=Command+and+Conquer buildable upon Biolab capture like the dinosaurs and visceroids.

data.title: Fixed a NullReferenceException on TilesetBuilder export
Cargo IsFull and RenderLandingCraft use of IsFull.
data.body:
I did this in two separate commits because the latter may not be desired but I thought it served as a nice indicator for the transport being unable to take more passengers.

I know we have HasSpace(int) already but I feel this is easier to read and makes a bit more sense than checking if (cargo.HasSpace(0)).

If this is not wanted please close to prevent clutter.

data.title: RenderLandingCraft moving Open anim fix.
data.body:
Added a TraitOrDefault for Mobile and with that a check for mobile.IsMoving to RenderLandingCraft.
Fixes #4641 hopefully.

data.title: Map Editor crashes while opening map file
data.body:
When I try to open these map files listed below, the map editor crashes without any error dialog. Its version is release-20131223. I use Debian testing with KDE. These map files don't seem to be proper zip files, they don't have the same icon as other map files which open correctly. They are located in ~/.openra/maps/ra/ .

https://www.dropbox.com/s/9ojmsy18rgjeiu4/1ec1adc91a78549732929e2d033732f84ad94f28.oramap

https://www.dropbox.com/s/t35q0palz4d28yt/329d856adc730dc888decdb09665a53362cc01f4.oramap

data.body: extracted from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4600

as part of the series to have an icon for everything if we ever get a unit command bar.

data.title: Idea for minesweeper infantry
data.body:
The mine sweeper would function like a radar jamer truck but it would have a reduced are of effect and mine's inside the AOE will be revealed so they can be shot down by other units.Also it could deactivate mine's by walking on them.

<bountysource-plugin>

data.body:
After player was defeated that owned some oilrigs, they are autodestructed instead of become back to neutral.

data.title: Fixed aircraft stance regression.
data.body:
Actors with EnableStances set to false should now ignore stance change commands.
Fixes #4555

data.title: Flood fill now treats similar grass/snow/desert tiles as the same - fixes #4695
Match Obelisk charge anim speed and FireDelay with charge sound
data.body:
Follow-up to #4699.

Might still need fine-tuning, so please don't merge this until the general consensus is that this is good enough.

data.title: Fix OpenRA.Utility not being able to locate mod assemblies
data.body: Fixes #4498

data.title: Renamed WRange to WDist.
data.body: It is generally easier to understand this name and it fits with the naming of WVec.

data.title: Renamed WRange to WDist.
data.body: It is generally easier to understand this name.

data.title: Fixes Obelisk Charge anim and sound
data.body:
As title says, takes care of #4698.

Seems that RenderBuildingCharge: doesn't work without AttackTesla:.
